Title: The Scavengender Hunt
Writer: Marta Kauffman (created by), Howard J. Morris (created by), Marta Kauffman, Howard J. Morris
Actors: Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Sam Waterston, Martin Sheen
Plot: Bud and Allison organize a scavenger hunt for the gender reveal party. Frankie suspects Sheree is after Grace's money. Sol goes to protests every day and Robert is worried he might get hurt.
